about_the_game:
This DLC is currently not available in English.
But sooner or later, I'll start working on the English translation.
So stay tuned!

To experience this DLC, you need to own the basic version of the game.
Once you purchase this DLC, you will be able to select the story "深海魆蜮" from the story selection menu.
No other DLC owned does not affect the operation of this DLC.

蜮, the monster under the water.
The boundary between normal and abnormal, between reality and dreams.
The human heart is dark, like the strange aliens that dwell deep beneath the calm sea.
The darkness rushes out through the void of the mind, and tragedy begins....

This chapter takes place in the spring of 2016, after the events of Inhuman Love have ended.
A bizarre painting reawakens the shadows of Duanmu Fei's early childhood.
At the same time, a murky case is once again taking place in Lian Hai, and the path to step into the abnormal is opened; how will Duanmu Fei decide?

  • The calm and cool Duanmu Fei
  • The background expands beyond the campus
  • New characters
  • Free to explore
  • 3D overruns
  • CG volume greatly increased
  • number of endings increased
